dmca.title: [ADMINS] About abuse on a site in a The Planet server
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not

claim.

Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, February 05, 2007 9:54 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2937960V] FW: [ADMINS] About abuse on a site
in a The Planet server

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. FW: [ADMINS] About abuse on a site in a The Planet server
Added by system at Monday, Feb 5 2007 03:52 pm 
X-MailFrom: rcarter@theplanet.com 
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net 
Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Mon Feb 5 15:51:59 2007

Received: from unknown (HELO DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL) (172.16.220.10) 
  by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 5 Feb 2007 21:51:59 -0000 
X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5

 charset="us-ascii"

Subject: FW: [ADMINS] About abuse on a site in a The Planet server 
Date: Mon, 5 Feb 2007 15:51:00 -0600 
Message-ID:
<17DDA2A3D59DFD4DAE62FCBE4FDC2F5B9A94D0@dald2exch01.PLANET.LOCAL> 
X-MS-Has-Attach:  
X-MS-TNEF-Correlator:  
Thread-Topic: [ADMINS] About abuse on a site in a The Planet server 
Thread-Index: AcdH896giZ8eXoS0TJGW2XbSWlB9jgBe9NPQ 
From: "Ryan Carter" <rcarter@theplanet.com> 
To: "abuse" <abuse@theplanet.com> 

MIME element (text/plain) 
-----Original Message----- 
From: Enrico Dias [enricodias@gmail.com] 
Sent: Saturday, February 03, 2007 6:32 PM 
To: Admins 
Subject: [ADMINS] About abuse on a site in a The Planet server 
 
I am Enrico Dias, owner of the Midia Digital Web (www.mdweb.com.br) and 
of a personal site soul.mdweb.com.br. 
  
A domain hosted in one of yours servers (www.oibr.com/pensamentos) 
plagiarized my site, total, also poems of the authors. I entered in 
contact with the owner of this site and I did not get success. I 
verified the WHOIS of its server and the email was invalid, all the data

was. I verified the IP and was of a server of the The Planet. I ask you 
to enter in contact with the reseler that host this domain to he remove 
this copy before I and the authors of the poems they have to take legal 
action against this abuse.   
 
 
--  
---------------------------------------------- 
Enrico Dias 
www.mdweb.com.br
